greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Minimal exponent in prime factorization of 3-smooth numbers.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: s = {}; m = 12; Do[n = 3^k; While[n <= 3^m, AppendTo[s, n]; n*=2], {k, 0, m}]; maxExp[1] = 0; maxExp[n_] := Min @@ Last /@ FactorInteger[n]; maxExp /@ Union[s] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Jan 29 2020 *)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 18 2003
